attributes.action: Ban all petitions involved getting trucks off the road !!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a driver of over 21 yrs experience it is blatently obvious that truck drivers are held in the same regard as gingers, so lets join forces  and get rid of any petition that discriminates against us. Trucks keep britain rolling! Gingers keep britain laughing!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
